Uses of Class
at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.layers.quality.AbstractQualityMeasure

Packages that use AbstractQualityMeasure
at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.layers.quality Classes in this package implement various quality measures, indicating the quality of the SOM mapping. 
 

Uses of AbstractQualityMeasure in at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.layers.quality

          Calculates the Quantisation Error, defined as the average distance between and input data vector and the weight-vector of its best-matching-unit.
Calculates the following values: Unit Quantisation error (qe).
